places.name: Canadian Tire
places.address: Canadian Tire, 2830 Bentall St, Vancouver, BC V5M 4H4

featured_reviews.review_id: The Garden Center at Canadian Tire this Year is Superb.  Better Prices and WAY more selection and variety than the Lowes and Home Depot close by. A shame Canadian Tire is associating itself with the Retail Failure London Drugs in a shared Flyer.  Makes me not look at it and throw it out.
featured_reviews.review_text: The Garden Center at Canadian Tire this Year is Superb.  Better Prices and WAY more selection and variety than the Lowes and Home Depot close by. A shame Canadian Tire is associating itself with the Retail Failure London Drugs in a shared Flyer.  Makes me not look at it and throw it out.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your fantastic review! We're delighted to hear that you had an excellent experience at our Garden Center. Providing a wide selection and variety of products at competitive prices is something we take pride in. Your satisfaction is our priority, and we're thrilled to know that we surpassed the offerings of other nearby stores. We appreciate your support and look forward to being your top choice for all your gardening needs. If there's anything else we can do to enhance your experience, please let us know. Nice photos... Happy gardening!

featured_reviews.review_id: I have to give a shout out to the parts department. The person working there had excellent mechanical knowledge of cars and had great customer service, I had a no start issue with my truck and it turn out his suggestion about the starter coils was correct. Especially since my Dodge dealership failed to understand the issue and find the fault. Also want to commend him for his patience with the number of customers requiring his help.
featured_reviews.review_text: I have to give a shout out to the parts department. The person working there had excellent mechanical knowledge of cars and had great customer service, I had a no start issue with my truck and it turn out his suggestion about the starter coils was correct. Especially since my Dodge dealership failed to understand the issue and find the fault. Also want to commend him for his patience with the number of customers requiring his help.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Thank you for the fantastic 5-star review! We're thrilled to hear about your positive experience with our parts department. It's great to know that our staff provided excellent mechanical knowledge and outstanding customer service. We're glad they were able to correctly diagnose and resolve the issue with your truck, especially when your Dodge dealership couldn't. We'll make sure to pass along your compliments and commendation for their patience. We're here to help, and your satisfaction is important to us. We look forward to serving you again in the future!

CT Grandview Team

featured_reviews.review_id: Convenient location, just off the highway. At a major intersection yet Still provides plenty of parking spaces. The store is sprawling and spans three floors - not the easiest to navigate. The staff is efficient but with few members it is best to look things up yourself on the website.
featured_reviews.review_text: Convenient location, just off the highway. At a major intersection yet Still provides plenty of parking spaces. The store is sprawling and spans three floors - not the easiest to navigate. The staff is efficient but with few members it is best to look things up yourself on the website.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Thanks for the rating Infinerdy. We hope to make your next visit a 4 or 5 star experience!

CT Grandview Team

featured_reviews.review_id: Lots of parking, the store itself is organized chaos. There is stuff everywhere. The seasonal section changes frequently. If you are looking for something in particular, search their website first and check quantities for your location if they only have one. It's likely they don't have it. The people at the automotive parts counter can be helpful.
featured_reviews.review_text: Lots of parking, the store itself is organized chaos. There is stuff everywhere. The seasonal section changes frequently. If you are looking for something in particular, search their website first and check quantities for your location if they only have one. It's likely they don't have it. The people at the automotive parts counter can be helpful.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Thank you for the 4-star review and for sharing your feedback. We're glad you found the parking convenient and our automotive parts counter staff helpful. We'll work on improving store organization and better website inventory accuracy to enhance your shopping experience. Your input is valuable to us, and we look forward to serving you again.

CT Grandview Team

featured_reviews.review_id: Very often you can get discounts on wheels in this store.Also, you don't have to wait long, you can register for literally the next day.The staff was polite and courteous.
featured_reviews.review_text: Very often you can get discounts on wheels in this store.Also, you don't have to wait long, you can register for literally the next day.The staff was polite and courteous.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Thank you for your kind words! We're delighted to hear you had a great experience with us. Providing discounts and prompt service is our priority, and we're pleased you noticed our polite and courteous staff. We look forward to serving you again soon!

CT Grandview Team

featured_reviews.review_id: Awesome customer service and the supervisor at the key replacement booth saved my butt. They were able to duplicate 5 different keys (mailbox, pad locks, drawers) that the minutekey machine couldn't.
featured_reviews.review_text: Awesome customer service and the supervisor at the key replacement booth saved my butt. They were able to duplicate 5 different keys (mailbox, pad locks, drawers) that the minutekey machine couldn't.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
We're thrilled to hear about your positive experience! Our team takes pride in assisting customers like you, and we're glad we could help with your various key replacements. Thank you for your 5-star review, and we look forward to assisting you again in the future if needed.

CT Grandview Team

featured_reviews.review_id:
I was doing tire rotation and inflation 2 days ago.
I asked for 37 psi for my tires where 33 is the factory's recommendation.
The counter also asked me the reason why I wanted to be 37 which was noted on the receipt. I answered my outer treads are lower and I have a heavy-duty to do.
I hadn't been told anything when my car was ready to pick up.
I found my tires were still 33 this morning as I felt my tires were so soft and called them, they replied they only did the factory's recommendation. I said I requested but nobody mentioned that when it finished. They said you could do it by yourself if you wanted to modify it.
I respect your standard for any reason, but something I requested and no one replied to that until I found it by myself.
(At least I have been told my tires could not be inflated up to 37 when I pay for my service. What do you think?)
Never come back with a robot service.
Not recommend.
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
We apologize for the oversight during your recent tire service visit. Your feedback is important to us, and we regret that we didn't meet your expectations. The team should have communicated to you they are not prepared to inflate the tires above manufacturers recommendation. This was a mistake on our part, and we are truly sorry. 

CT Grandview Team

featured_reviews.review_id:
Today's visit to this store was incredibly disappointing, to say the least. If I could rate it a 0, I certainly would. My husband and I stopped by to purchase some items, including supplies for his coworkers. We paid separately at the self-checkout, and my husband also exchanged a measuring tape, which he started using right away, given his construction outfit.

As we headed towards the exit on the first floor where we had parked our car, the security guard requested to see our receipts. We dutifully presented every single bill for all our purchases, even down to the 10 pens (which were just 50 cents each). Despite our cooperation, it seemed the security guard was not satisfied. He meticulously counted the pens and scrutinized the bills.

What baffled us was when he asked my husband to remove his jacket. We complied, revealing the six bills we had presented earlier, everything perfectly in order. He cited it as a company policy, but was it really necessary to ask about the jacket? Did they have to count the pens too? It felt excessive and, frankly, quite ridiculous.

We had just spent $100 in the store that day, but this experience was far from pleasant. We used to be regular customers, but today's incident was beyond embarrassing. It's frustrating when you consider the prevalent issue of theft, especially by homeless individuals, and it was clear we weren't the ones they should be concerned about. Regrettably, I have no intention of returning to this store. Their insistence on checking receipts has always been irksome, but today, they truly took it to another level.

Note: I can attach the bills here, in case you really want to double check.
featured_reviews.review_text:

Note: I can attach the bills here, in case you really want to double check.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hi Daniela

We are deeply sorry for the unpleasant experience you had during your recent visit to our store. Your feedback is important to us, and we take it seriously. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and frustration caused by the security check process.

We understand that the extensive scrutiny of your purchases and the request to remove your jacket were unnecessary and felt excessive. Our goal is to create a welcoming and positive shopping experience for our customers, and it's clear we fell short in this instance.

We value your patronage and are genuinely sorry that you no longer feel comfortable shopping at our store. We will review our security procedures and provide additional training to our staff to ensure that such incidents are avoided in the future.

Thank you for bringing this to our attention, and we appreciate your understanding. If there is anything we can do to regain your trust or if you have any further comments or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to us directly. 604-431-3570

CT Grandview Leadership Team

places.name: Canadian Tire
places.address: Canadian Tire, 2290 Cambie St, Vancouver, BC V5Z 2T7

featured_reviews.review_id: Been here a couple times as I've always gone to the Richmond locations. I was completely overwhelmed with the amount of products this location has. This is a good thing! I love walking through isles. Washroom is unbelievably clean! Comparing to the one we have here in Richmond. Both locations have run down dirty washrooms! I love the scenery and the background music as I went through the walk-a-lator. Good call on that! A couple things that turned a 5 star rating to a 4 are: The product that I was looking for, I did not find, and parking is not free... Actually, another one would be, there is a greeter, who does nothing but stare at you!

featured_reviews.review_id:
No one was available to help in the key section for 15 minutes. When they did finally come they were able to replace my house key, as it was out of stock. I was told it would be back in stock for weeks or even months, for a common house key.

The lack of stock is understandable, but that lack of care from the staff there was really disappointing. I felt like I was being a burden trying to use their service.

featured_reviews.review_id: This is by far the best spot for anything automobile related. What truly sets this Canadian Tire apart, however, is their commitment to customer satisfaction. The entire team always go above and beyond to answer any questions or concerns and ultimately, to make sure your leave their facility with a smile on your face. The technicians always deliver high-quality work promptly, and their commitment to customer satisfaction is unparalleled. Keep up the great work!

featured_reviews.review_id: Excellent customer service, very friendly and helpful staff! I love the products at this store and some stuff can be surprisingly cheap especially when on sale! I definitely will be planning on going back as there is a wonderful selection of stuff to buy and good staff members there who are helpful!
featured_reviews.review_text: Excellent customer service, very friendly and helpful staff! I love the products at this store and some stuff can be surprisingly cheap especially when on sale! I definitely will be planning on going back as there is a wonderful selection of stuff to buy and good staff members there who are helpful!

featured_reviews.review_id:
Extremely Disappointed with Canadian Tire's Customer Service.
I recently had an extremely disappointing experience at Canadian Tire at this location. I purchased a product that turned out to be defective just a day after purchase. Naturally, I returned to the store to request a refund or exchange.
However, neither the supervisor nor the managers were willing to process the return simply because the packaging was open. This was perplexing as I had to open the packaging to use the product in the first place. When I asked for an exchange, I was informed that they did not have the item in stock.
Instead of offering a satisfactory solution, they suggested that I purchase other items that I had no need for. The situation escalated to the point where they threatened to call the police and forcibly removed me from the store. To add insult to injury, my shopping was thrown towards me and then out of the store.
This experience has left me feeling extremely upset and disrespected. I strongly discourage anyone from shopping at this store due to their poor customer service and lack of understanding towards customers' rights.

featured_reviews.review_id: I enjoy shopping here immensely. Especially around the holidays, very exciting for me. I love how they have everything arranged, very easy to find what you are looking for. I can't wait until Halloween to go shopping for stuff or Christmas time, they always have beautiful displays. I love the lights and just about anything you can think of they have it all. Just beautiful.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Parking can be an issue. If you park on the street, entrance to the store is not overly convenient. I wouldn't want to attempted it with crutches or in a wheelchair. The store is massive and has pretty well anything you could think of AND at a competitive price.

Staff members to answer any questions are in short supply. This has always been the case with any Canadian tire I have visited.
This store offers a large touch-screen marquee with a search feature. A few taps will show you where whatever you want is located, how many are stock, and whether it's an online-only product. KUDOS to CT for this, but it doesn't make up for their well earned reputation of being chronically short-staffed in experienced salespeople.
When you do find someone, there's usually one or two people ahead of you.
TO THEIR CREDIT, my experience has been that staff members are competently versed in the best and weakest points of a product and gear their advice towards you to getting the best value and fit to your particular needs.
Still, unless you have unlimited time and patience, do your own due diligence BEFORE going to the store. This will prove expeditious and at the same time, help ensure your shopping experience doesn't devolve to an exercise in frustration. XoXo

featured_reviews.review_id:
God forbid the young kids they hire at this location have to do their jobs !

I come here often, I spend alot of cash here and haven't had a problem before. Today I went in and bought a couple of things and when I couldn't find something I asked Employee #1 where it was. He had his back turned towards me and was slow and reluctant to turn around and assist. He told me the aisle where it was, but his attitude was like I was really putting him out by *GASP* asking him to do his job.

Went to the aisle, item wasn't there, asking Employee #2, I asked him where said item was, he was looking through a  flyer intently, and again, his attitude was like "how dare you ask me a question!?" He muttered something and just pointed to the wall, I said I was looking for a specific item, he goes "those ARE them" (they were intact NOT them)  he had a major attitude with me, is this how kids act these days? I get it, you don't need any discernible skill to be a stock boy, but THE LEAST you could do is act like you like your job and be pleasant to customers. I would think that, that is the the bare minimum your hiring manager would want you to do, for your minimum wage job.

Employee #1 was a tall young man, fair hair and light eyes restocking in the tools section 230 ish November 4th, Employee #2 was "Jack" working the bike counter.

They have a computer showing the flashlight I wanted, it says push the button and the item will flash, head down and get it. So I go to the very end of the store and it's locked up. So Ihave to walk all the way back to customer service and the guy said go back down there. I'll send someone. I'm not walking all the way back down there. Maybe next time have it on the computer screen saying it is locked up and ask for help before walking all the way down there.
Absolutely no customer service.

featured_reviews.review_id: I basically found what I wanted on my own. But when I asked for help. Customer service person helped me right away. Very nice...and cashier was great and good to talk to.... but as usual you always end up buy what you didn't go there for. Like this watch for only $9.99!

featured_reviews.review_id:
Title: Disappointing Experience with Rude Staff (Kim) at Canadian Tire

Rating:  (1/5)

I recently visited Canadian Tire, a store where I have been a frequent customer for quite some time. However, my most recent visit left me extremely disappointed and frustrated due to the behavior of one of the staff members, Kim.

As my friend and I entered the store with our scooters, we were suddenly accosted by Kim, a very rude old lady who aggressively yelled at us to place our scooters at the front. This encounter was completely unexpected, as in all my previous visits, no one, not even the manager, had ever instructed us to do so. Moreover, Kim's tone and attitude were uncalled for and entirely disrespectful.

Feeling disheartened by the unpleasant encounter, my friend and I decided to explore the first floor of the store. To our surprise, we encountered no issues there. The staff on the first floor did not seem to mind us carrying our scooters around, and they treated us with the decency and respect that we deserved as customers.

It is truly disheartening to encounter such behavior from a staff member, especially in a store that I have regarded highly in the past. Customer service is a vital aspect of any establishment, and the lack of professionalism demonstrated by Kim tarnished the overall experience.

I hope that Canadian Tire takes this feedback seriously and addresses the issue at hand. As a loyal customer, I expect better treatment and respect from the staff, and incidents like these should not be overlooked.

I sincerely hope that my negative experience with Kim was an isolated incident and that Canadian Tire will take appropriate measures to ensure such behavior does not recur in the future.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I am regular customer at this Canadian Tire location as this is my go to store for my personal and workplace needs including my car service. Ever since, I had good experience with this store and the staff until today when one of the staff/manager who stocking the toy section showed a bad customer service.
I was browsing the hotwheels bin and I started putting all the hotwheels that I have looked at to the other bins around it. Suddenly, the lady spoke to me and said that those are old stocks (which I am aware that it is not). I kind of understood what she was trying to say and I replied politely "Don't worry about it because I will put everything back once I am done."
She replied again "of course I am worried about it because it is our store."
I totally understand where she is coming from. However, how does she expect customers to go through a bin of toys without taking them out of the bin considering there are varieties of hotwheels? It is just disappointing how she treats customers. I am also part of a management and we do not treat our clients like this, she was so unprofessional and I believe she needs more coaching and training. I was not able to get the name the person. I hope Canadian Tire management will do something about it .

featured_reviews.review_id:
Automotive Department Store
We came by to check out their Black Friday sales event. I came to see the two household appliances that were advertised and scored excellent buys. Brightly lit aisles and well stocked displays. The microwave oven section was half empty but I managed to find a boxed Cuisinart air fryer convention toaster oven in stock as advertised at 50% off along with an additional $50 discount at the checkout! Wow! I also purchased a magic bullet brand personal blender on sale for $29.95. This place is a wonderful store for incredible buys. I come often to purchase specials from their flyers when there are things we need. The staff are helpful and knowledgeable. They publish and distribute a flyer every week or every other week depending on the season. This place is advertised as an automotive store but it has so much more to offer with a great selection of housewares, sporting goods and making your home beautiful. Well worth a visit.
featured_reviews.review_text:
Automotive Department Store
We came by to check out their Black Friday sales event. I came to see the two household appliances that were advertised and scored excellent buys. Brightly lit aisles and well stocked displays. The microwave oven section was half empty but I managed to find a boxed Cuisinart air fryer convention toaster oven in stock as advertised at 50% off along with an additional $50 discount at the checkout! Wow! I also purchased a magic bullet brand personal blender on sale for $29.95. This place is a wonderful store for incredible buys. I come often to purchase specials from their flyers when there are things we need. The staff are helpful and knowledgeable. They publish and distribute a flyer every week or every other week depending on the season. This place is advertised as an automotive store but it has so much more to offer with a great selection of housewares, sporting goods and making your home beautiful. Well worth a visit.

featured_reviews.review_id: Bought a wrecking bar at this location. The wrecking bars were put in place of different wrecking bar (same size but different material) where the sticker price was half of the original price. I didn't notice while paying. When i came back thinking i got overcharged, the customer service girl was quite rude. Didn't even try to find my order. Manager found my order and told that girl, the product number that was charged, over the phone. She told me that i bought another item than the one i was claiming. I told her that there was some mistake and asked her to come with me to the stall from where i picked from, to which she said, it's not her work. Then i went and took a picture of the sticker price and showed it to her. Then she just said, no you are showing me the wrong picture. I again asked her to come with me to the stall to which she refused again. Kept on asking me what i need her to do. I asked to refund the difference. Mind that, i still don't know that i purchased wrong item because of their fault. Then i asked for manager. Manager promptly came and i asked him to come with me. He noticed the wrong label and told me what had happened. The customer service girl experience was the first time i was met with such hostility. Not coming back to this location.

featured_reviews.review_id:
The CT Triangle website is an excellent e-commerce HUB. I really like the aisle locator feature and the inventory availability seems to be accurate.
The store clerks are friendly but as with many Retailers are NOT generally knowledgeable nor do they have any Authority to fix a problem.
I shopped at the North Van store and it has impressive displays and great selection. A nice place to shop.
HOWEVER, the CT self check out is a DISASTER
Overall I'd rate CT North Van better than average and a nice place to shop.
5 Stars requires new self checkout system

featured_reviews.review_id:
Placed an order for a new set of all weather tires on Nov 1st. It was stated on the order confirmation email that the tires will be ready for pick up between Nov 2 and Nov 5. Tires were not ready for pick up until Nov 13. This was extremely frustrating.

Second issue was that I followed the Curbside Pickup workflow via the platform and on the webpage it said that my order was being prepared and that I was 4th in line. Just out of sheer luck, I had to use the washroom and decided to follow up on my order before walking back to my car. This is when the guy at the Automotive Parts counter told me that customers who bought tires cannot opt in for Curbside Pickup.

If this is the case then there is a bug on the platform and should therefore be fixed. If this is not true then shame on your staff for not providing proper customer service.

Frustrating customer experience to say the least!

featured_reviews.review_id:
I recently made a trip to Canadian Tire, expecting the typical courteous Canadian shopping experience. To my dismay, the staff were notably rude and indifferent. I spent a good amount of time wandering the aisles, hoping someone would notice my evident need for assistance. The absence of responsiveness was astounding, especially for a retail establishment of Canadian Tire's reputation.

Taking the initiative, I approached multiple staff members to voice my concerns and hopefully get the assistance I needed. To my shock, instead of being met with understanding or an apology, one of the employees sharply retorted, "Dude! What's your problem? I'm busy here!" This response was not only unprofessional but also an outright dismissal of a customer's genuine concerns.

The experience left a sour taste in my mouth. It's unfortunate to see such a decline in customer service, especially in a place like Canadian Tire, which has always been a go-to for many Canadians. I had always held the store in high regard, but this incident has made me reconsider future visits.

While everyone can have a bad day, the blatant disregard and subsequent rudeness were beyond justifiable. Customers deserve respect and attentive service, especially in an establishment as renowned as Canadian Tire. It's my sincere hope that the management addresses this issue, as no customer should ever leave feeling belittled or dismissed.

featured_reviews.review_id: Canadian Tire in Richmond, BC, is a reliable go-to for all your household and outdoor needs. This store has a wide selection of products, from automotive supplies to home improvement tools, making it a versatile one-stop shop. The knowledgeable staff members are always ready to assist and provide helpful recommendations. The well-organized aisles and clear signage make navigation easy, ensuring a convenient shopping experience. Whether you're tackling a DIY project, stocking up on outdoor gear, or simply browsing for home essentials, Canadian Tire in Richmond has you covered. It's a trusted destination for quality products and friendly service.

featured_reviews.review_id:
We had a battery replaced but were not informed of the total cost until we returned for pickup. I argued over the labour charge and they provided a discount on the bill.

The work appears professional and I would go back without hesitation however get the full price upfront for a job like this with specific labour costs so you don't receive an unwelcomed surprise.
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.review_id: Great service! Took the time to listen! Excellent diagnostics! Can't thank the shop enough. My daughter lives in Vancouver and I called on her behalf and the shop was able to help her out with same-day service. My daughter is a person with a disability, so her vehicle is very important to her as accessible transportation is not always available. The shop was very understanding, very responsive and very helpful. Would definitely go back!  Special thanks to Alex for the exceptional above and beyond service!
featured_reviews.review_text: Great service! Took the time to listen! Excellent diagnostics! Can't thank the shop enough. Thank you so much for your heartfelt feedback! We're truly humbled to hear about your positive experience with our service. Ensuring that all our customers feel heard and cared for is our top priority. It's reassuring to know that Alex could provide the exceptional service that we always strive for, especially in situations that matter most.

You and your daughter's trust in our service means a lot, and we're always here to assist with any future needs. Please don't hesitate to reach out anytime!

Warm regards,

Johnny Ray Ritchie
Operations Manager
Canadian Tire Auto Service
604-707-2291

featured_reviews.review_id: I gave my flat tire for repair last night.  I was told that it would be ready by 11AM the next day & will get a call from the shop. Next day I waited until 2:30Pm & went to the Auto shop. To my surprise, they mixed up my tire & hadn't even started working on it. I had to wait for more than an hour & wasted my time. Unprofessional behaviour.

Operations Manager
Canadian Tire Auto Service
604-707-2291

featured_reviews.review_id:
They just didn't seem to understand anything I told them, that's why the one star review.
I wanted to buy tires that where bigger, and I thought that Alex took my order right, but he just order the stock ones even though I wanted another size, and they didn't allow me to buy them even though I wasn't putting the tires with them, but Alex just didn't understand that! Just wanted to purchase the tires and I would install them somewhere else.
Also on our first conversation I thought I also purchased alignment, but he didn't put it in the bill. Arrange an appointment to get the alignment done, and when I come to do it, they told me the other person that took my appointment, set it as wheel balancing... which I already did with the company that put my tires(bought at Canadian tire) so I just needed the alignment, when I came for the alignment Alex told me it wouldn't be possible at the time and ask if I wanted to reschedule! I was so done at this point that I will never buy from the Cambie location ever again!
featured_reviews.review_text:
They just didn't seem to understand anything I told them, that's why the one star review.
I wanted to buy tires that where bigger, and I thought that Alex took my order right, but he just order the stock ones even though I wanted another size, and they didn't allow me to buy them even though I wasn't putting the tires with them, but Alex just didn't understand that! Just wanted to purchase the tires and I would install them somewhere else.
Also on our first conversation I thought I also purchased alignment, but he didn't put it in the bill. Arrange an appointment to get the alignment done, and when I come to do it, they told me the other person that took my appointment, set it as wheel balancing... which I already did with the company that put my tires(bought at Canadian tire) so I just needed the alignment, when I came for the alignment Alex told me it wouldn't be possible at the time and ask if I wanted to reschedule! I was so done at this point that I will never buy from the Cambie location ever again!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hello Ivan,

I'm sorry to hear about your recent experience at our Cambie location. We aim to provide accurate and top-notch service, and it seems we've missed the mark during your visit.

I understand that there was a misunderstanding regarding the tire size and alignment service you requested. Please rest assured that this feedback will be taken seriously and addressed with our team to avoid such miscommunication in the future.

If you're open to it, I would like to discuss this matter further to better understand where the miscommunication occurred, and how we can improve. Please feel free to reach out to me directly at 604-707-2291.

Thank you for bringing this to our attention, and I hope we have the opportunity to regain your trust in the future.

Sincerely,

Johnny Ray Ritchie
Operations Manager
Canadian Tire Auto Service
604-707-2291

featured_reviews.review_id: Went in for brake job that was done poorly Got car back with a leak. No issues before the brake job. Brought it back and was charged to get leak fixed. They told me it was a hose. Leak was not fixed in hose.
featured_reviews.review_text: Went in for brake job that was done poorly Got car back with a leak. No issues before the brake job. Brought it back and was charged to get leak fixed. They told me it was a hose. Leak was not fixed in hose.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hello,

Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your recent experience at our shop. I am truly sorry to hear that you are not satisfied with the brake job and subsequent service you received, and I am here to assist you in resolving this issue.

Upon reviewing our records, I could not find any recent history of the service you are referring to in your review. The last record on file is from over two years ago. During that service, there were no charges for fixing a power steering leak. Instead,  we charged $39.99 for an inspection, and the rest of the services were performed at no charge. This included cleaning the power steering lines and reservoir, finding a leak from a loose clamp, tightening it, and asking to monitor the situation as no further leaks were noticed at that time.

If this is not the work order you are referencing in your review, could you please reach out to us and provide more details on the specific concerns you have? We want to ensure that we address the right issue and take the necessary steps to make things right.

We value your business and are committed to addressing your concerns to ensure your satisfaction.

Sincerely,

Johnny Ray Ritchie
Operations Manager
Canadian Tire Auto Service
604-707-2291

featured_reviews.review_id: Great service and very competent team - they were able to squeeze us in within a day and have our vehicle fixed quickly while we were visiting from out of town. Robbie and Kyle did phenomenal work, thanks again!
featured_reviews.review_text: Great service and very competent team - they were able to squeeze us in within a day and have our vehicle fixed quickly while we were visiting from out of town. Robbie and Kyle did phenomenal work, thanks again!

Hello Shan,

Thank you for your wonderful feedback! I've passed this on to the both of them, and they truly appreciated your kind words. We hope you have a wonderful weekend, and a safe trip home.

Sincerely,

Johnny Ray Ritchie

featured_reviews.review_id: The most disorganized automotive service centre I have come across. Missing paperwork, quoted times hours off, every service writer providing different information, zero customer communication whatsoever. Polite but ineffective.
featured_reviews.review_text: The most disorganized automotive service centre I have come across. Missing paperwork, quoted times hours off, every service writer providing different information, zero customer communication whatsoever. Polite but ineffective.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I need it Winter Tires for my GMC vehicle, and Tao the Manager of the Shop suggested me to get the Michelin tires for my SUV.  They had it installed and also they check to see if there was anything else my vehicle was in need of repair work need it.

Peter the installer was so nice to pack my All Season Tires in a Bag without any ripping and cleaned.

I have taken my vehicle for repairs for many years now and I trust thier work and dedication plus they care for the customer and tell you what is need it and what you don't need as many other shops that try to sell you things you don't need.

I would recommend this location to anyone who needs any kind of work for your vehicle.

Clean Shop, Nice and pleasant staff plus excellent service.

As Auto Centre Repair Shop they perform many type of repairs like:

Tire Installation, Tire Change, Engine Repair, Car Inspection, Tire Centre, Tire Shop, Oil Change, Tire Repair, Car Repairs, Van Repairs, Truck Repairs, Book Appointment, Winter Installation, Summer Installation, Radiator Repair and System Flush, Transmission Oil Change, Repairs, Shop, Flat Tire Repair.
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hi G Brenes, I'm happy to hear that the Auto Service Team has provided you with such great service over the years and I'll be sure to recognize both Tao and Peter for the extra effort during your recent winter tire purchase. It's great to see such a detailed review outlining all the various services we provide our customers coming from a prominent local guide. Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you over the years. We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you during your next visit.
- Chris, General Manager

featured_reviews.review_id:
Cons: Very lack of products.
Example, No in stock windshield washer all seasons.
Not enough stock for oil drain plug, very expensive $8 dollars when it's real cost only $3 buck.
The brake shoes or brake pad not on shelter.
Mostly products overpriced.

Pros: convenient nearby groceries shopping.
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
We appreciate your feedback, and we're sorry to hear about your experience. We'll work on addressing the product availability and pricing concerns you've raised. Your comments are valuable and will help us improve. We're pleased to know you find our location convenient for nearby groceries, and we hope to better serve you in the future. Thank you for sharing your thoughts.

Grandview Auto Centre Team

featured_reviews.review_id: In store shopping two week ago and found excellent staff service with locating all the shoppings I need. The employee "Mei Lin" was fast and efficient into helping me find all the items I need, she also helped me locate two hand-trucks and push them to the cashier for me. Well done!

featured_reviews.review_id: Go to Canadian tire to buy camping gear never to fix your car or change a tire, just waited 2 hours to have them tell me they can't fix my tire, they probably had made this assesment in the first 2 minites , had to actually ask to see what was going on or they would have had me waiting another 2 hours! Not the first time I have had bad service. Will never be back to fix anything regarding my vehicles.
featured_reviews.review_text: Go to Canadian tire to buy camping gear never to fix your car or change a tire, just waited 2 hours to have them tell me they can't fix my tire, they probably had made this assesment in the first 2 minites , had to actually ask to see what was going on or they would have had me waiting another 2 hours! Grandview Auto Centre Team

featured_reviews.review_id:
Superb service, communication, and pricing. For something straightforward like a tire change, you can't go wrong here.

It's not their fault the City of Vancouver decided to divert most of its residential development to commercial and industrial areas, creating a shortage of mechanic shop space. All shops are busy these days.

featured_reviews.review_id: Have a flat tire asked them how much to repair it. Was told around $40 but no appointments for 10 days! Leave the car if you want. That's Canada's garage for you. Can't do a 10 minute repair so a guy can get to work. Mechanic down the road said bring it right in it's a quick fix.
